name: Bounties at Noon
description:
Description

Duelling. A challenge of speed, dexterity, and willpower. Not for the faint of heart.

A colourful gang has been causing turmoil in a town. The local sheriff has issued bounties for prominent members, but nobody dares to confront the goons because of their famous gunslinging capabilities. Nobody, but you.

Take down Red Rudy, Green Grover and the other bandits as you slay them in the one type of match that counts, and free the people from their plague.

This game was made for the Tri-Jam #125 and was made in approximately 3 hours (under 3:15 at least). The theme was "only one enemy", interpreted as fighting with one enemy.

Many thanks to Eeve Somepx for the font, Joel Steudler for the music and Sidearm Studios for the sound effects.

Gameplay

Use the mouse to focus on your opponent. Keep focussing for a short burst of slow-motion when the guns are drawn and a better aim. Use WASD or the arrow keys to move your hand. Make sure your hand stays on your revolver to minimize the time it takes to draw it.

Problems & Feedback

Please leave any problems you encounter (or any different type of feedback) in the comments, that would be greatly appreciated. :)

I hope you have fun! And thank you for taking a look.
